00030 #include "AUD_SquareFactory.h"
00031 #include "AUD_CallbackIIRFilterReader.h"
00032 
00033 sample_t AUD_SquareFactory::squareFilter(AUD_CallbackIIRFilterReader* reader, float* threshold)
00034 {
00035     float in = reader->x(0);
00036     if(in >= *threshold)
00037         return 1;
00038     else if(in <= -*threshold)
00039         return -1;
00040     else
00041         return 0;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void AUD_SquareFactory::endSquareFilter(float* threshold)
00045 {
00046     delete threshold;
00047 }
00048 
00049 AUD_SquareFactory::AUD_SquareFactory(AUD_Reference<AUD_IFactory> factory, float threshold) :
00050         AUD_EffectFactory(factory),
00051         m_threshold(threshold)
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 float AUD_SquareFactory::getThreshold() const
00056 {
00057     return m_threshold;
00058 }
00059 
00060 AUD_Reference<AUD_IReader> AUD_SquareFactory::createReader()
00061 {
00062     return new AUD_CallbackIIRFilterReader(getReader(), 1, 1,
00063                                            (doFilterIIR) squareFilter,
00064                                            (endFilterIIR) endSquareFilter,
00065                                            new float(m_threshold));
00066 }
